Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/drm2/dist/drm/nouveau/include/nvkm/core/memory.h

1/* $NetBSD: memory.h,v 1.3 2018/08/27 07:36:28 riastradh Exp $ */
2
3#ifndef __NVKM_MEMORY_H__
4#define __NVKM_MEMORY_H__
5#include <core/os.h>
6struct nvkm_device;
7struct nvkm_vma;
8struct nvkm_vm;
9
10enum nvkm_memory_target {
11 NVKM_MEM_TARGET_INST,
12 NVKM_MEM_TARGET_VRAM,
13 NVKM_MEM_TARGET_HOST,
14};
15
16struct nvkm_memory {
17 const struct nvkm_memory_func *func;
18};
19
20#ifdef __NetBSD__
21# define __nvkm_memory_iomem
22# define __iomem __nvkm_memory_iomem
23#endif
24
25struct nvkm_memory_func {
26 void *(*dtor)(struct nvkm_memory *);
27 enum nvkm_memory_target (*target)(struct nvkm_memory *);
28 u64 (*addr)(struct nvkm_memory *);
29 u64 (*size)(struct nvkm_memory *);
30 void (*boot)(struct nvkm_memory *, struct nvkm_vm *);
31 void __iomem *(*acquire)(struct nvkm_memory *);
32 void (*release)(struct nvkm_memory *);
33 u32 (*rd32)(struct nvkm_memory *, u64 offset);
34 void (*wr32)(struct nvkm_memory *, u64 offset, u32 data);
35 void (*map)(struct nvkm_memory *, struct nvkm_vma *, u64 offset);
36};
37
38#ifdef __NetBSD__
39# undef __iomem
40#endif
41
42void nvkm_memory_ctor(const struct nvkm_memory_func *, struct nvkm_memory *);
43int nvkm_memory_new(struct nvkm_device *, enum nvkm_memory_target,
44 u64 size, u32 align, bool zero, struct nvkm_memory **);
45void nvkm_memory_del(struct nvkm_memory **);
46#define nvkm_memory_target(p) (p)->func->target(p)
47#define nvkm_memory_addr(p) (p)->func->addr(p)
48#define nvkm_memory_size(p) (p)->func->size(p)
49#define nvkm_memory_boot(p,v) (p)->func->boot((p),(v))
50#define nvkm_memory_map(p,v,o) (p)->func->map((p),(v),(o))
51
52/* accessor macros - kmap()/done() must bracket use of the other accessor
53 * macros to guarantee correct behaviour across all chipsets
54 */
55#define nvkm_kmap(o) (o)->func->acquire(o)
56#define nvkm_ro32(o,a) (o)->func->rd32((o), (a))
57#define nvkm_wo32(o,a,d) (o)->func->wr32((o), (a), (d))
58#define nvkm_mo32(o,a,m,d) ({ \
59 u32 _addr = (a), _data = nvkm_ro32((o), _addr); \
60 nvkm_wo32((o), _addr, (_data & ~(m)) | (d)); \
61 _data; \
62})
63#define nvkm_done(o) (o)->func->release(o)
64#endif
65
